Name: Azhdaha
Title: Ancient Geovishap Ancestor: Azhdaha
Desc: The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Azhdaha

26022.Name: Aura of Majesty
26022.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If a Crystallize reaction occurs, then this character will perform $[K1012].\nIf during the usage of this skill, the character hasn't absorbed an element's power yet, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126022]</color> will be attached.

K1012.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Absorption</color>
K1012.Desc: Azhdaha can absorb the power of {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>. (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Frostspike Wave</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Torrential Rebuke</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Blazing Rebuke</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Thunderstorm Wave</color>.

C126022.Name: Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization
C126022.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> DMG:</color> If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs $[K1012].

K1012.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Absorption</color>
K1012.Desc: Azhdaha can absorb the power of {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>. (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Frostspike Wave</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Torrential Rebuke</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Blazing Rebuke</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Thunderstorm Wave</color>.

26024.Name: Decimating Rockfall
26024.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. DMG +1 for each element previously absorbed.

26025.Name: Stone Facets
26025.Desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126021]</color>.

C126021.Name: Stone Facets: Elemental Absorption
C126021.Desc: The character can absorb the power of the Elements, including {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, and then based on the element absorbed, gain the skills {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>$[S66013]</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>$[S66023]</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>$[S66033]</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>$[S66043]</color>. (The character can only have one Elemental Type absorbed at once, and this status will record the Elemental Type previously absorbed)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character absorbs an element of a different type than the currently absorbed element:</color> Generate 1 Elemental Die of the same type as the Element that was just absorbed.
